研究人员从 SSH 服务器签名错误中提取 RSA 密钥https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/researchers-extract-rsa-keys-from-ssh-server-signing-errors/ Sun, 19 Nov 2023 10:01:10 -0500比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/researchers-extract-rsa-keys-from-ssh-server-signing-errors/ A team of academic researchers from universities in California and Massachusetts demonstrated that it's possible under certain conditions for passive network attackers to retrieve secret RSA keys from naturally occurring errors leading to failed SSH (secure shell) connection attempts.
